insert into opening_applies (apply_customer_id, preliminary_verify_user_id, terminal_id, status, created_at, updated_at, types, merchant_id, merchant_name, sex, birthday, card_id, phone, email, city_id, name, pay_channel_id, account_bank_num, account_bank_name, account_bank_code, tax_registered_no, organization_code_no, billing_cyde_id ) values (#{applyCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preliminaryVerifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountBankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegisteredNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationCodeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCydeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update opening_applies set apply_customer_id = #{applyCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preliminary_verify_user_id = #{preliminaryVerifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, types = #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_bank_num = #{accountBankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_bank_name = #{accountBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_bank_code = #{accountBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_registered_no = #{taxRegisteredNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code_no = #{organizationCodeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billing_cyde_id = #{billingCydeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, apply_customer_id, preliminary_verify_user_id, terminal_id, status, created_at, updated_at, types, merchant_id, merchant_name, sex, birthday, card_id, phone, email, city_id, name, pay_channel_id, account_bank_num, account_bank_name, account_bank_code, tax_registered_no, organization_code_no, billing_cyde_id from opening_applies where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, apply_customer_id, preliminary_verify_user_id, terminal_id, status, created_at, updated_at, types, merchant_id, merchant_name, sex, birthday, card_id, phone, email, city_id, name, pay_channel_id, account_bank_num, account_bank_name, account_bank_code, tax_registered_no, organization_code_no, billing_cyde_id from opening_applies
select * from opening_applies where terminal_id=#{param1} order by created_at desc limit 1
